related_questions.question:
There is a new mature tourism park in my town called Panorama Kedah Tempunak. The park is located in Tempunak    Kapuas village. It only takes thirty minutes from my house by motorcycle to go there. It is a very big park, with colorful
flowers everywhere. There are also many fruit plants, such as papayas, rambutans, rose apples, and dragon fruits. In
the middle of the park, there is a big lake. ive can explore the lake by using small duck-like boats. Next to the lake, there
is a grassy landscape that makes the park looks green and fertile. The park has some outdoor benches and hammocks
where we can sit and enjoy the view while eating snacks and drink. The park is really worth a visit.
36. What can we find in Panorama Kedah Tempunak?
A indoor benches
B. small river
C. friendly villagers
D. grassy landscape
37. How long does it take to go there from the writer house?
A. 20 minutes
B. 25 minutes
C.30 minutes
D. 35 minutes
38 Which statement is NOT TRUE about the park based on the text above?
A. There is a big lake in the middle of the park
C. there are lion-shape boats in the lake.
B. There are many fruit plants in the park
D. the park is located in Tempunak​

related_questions.question: Diana:the weather is nice. and it's a....daydesi:yes. lets play outdoor

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Diana:the weather is nice. and it's a sunny day

Desi: yes. lets play outdoor!

Penjelasan:

Jawaban dicetak tebal dan merupakan kata sifat (Adjective) yaitu sunny yang berarti cerah dan berfungsi untuk menjelaskan kata benda (Noun) day. Karena hari cerah, maka Desi mengajak untuk bermain di luar.

Semoga membantu ya.

My name is Raditia. I went to BorobudurTemple last weekend. I went there with my
classmates and teachers. We went there by bus.It was a program of my school to learn
Indonesia history.
I was so amazed seeing the temple. It's so wonderful. It's Hindu-Buddhist temple. It's was
built in nith century by Sailendra dynasty. My friends and I really noticed our guide who told
about the history of th temple. The guide ,Mr Tom explained evey single thing about the temple
very clearly and detail. I also took several pictures in the temple.Beside I get knowledgeabout
Borobudur temple.I enjoy the view.It's was my that I will never forget.
